title: Who out of these five 80s guitarists would you pick from first to last: Chris Holmes (WASP), Warren DeMartini (Ratt), Vivian Campbell (Dio), C.C. DeVille (Poison), and Tracii Guns (L.A. Guns)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Weird question. I’d pick Vivian Campbell as the best of the five and C.C. Deville as worst. I think Warren DeMartini in say, 1984, would be in the running for 2nd. I don’t know enough about Guns to say he’s better or worse than Holmes, who wasn’t as bad as C.C. Of course this just my opinion….

Vivian Campbell. Just the solo in Rainbow in the Dark gets you here.Warren DeMartini. Killer riffs. Great solos.CC DeVille. Not my favorite music, but CC sober is pretty good.Tracii Guns. Never heard him and went wow.Chris Holmes was hammered the 2 times I saw him live.
